name: soft-boiled
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.x-y: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.
